attributes.action: politely ask Universal Music to donate at least some of the proceeds from sales of the album 'Heroes' by The Band of The Coldstream Guards to a military charity such as Help for Heroes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The album 'Heroes', being released by Universal Music subsiduary Decca, features recordings of The Band of The Coldstream Guards.  This is a British Army band made of serving soldiers and is funded by the British taxpayer.  Whilst we applaud this release and do not begrudge the band or label making money from sales, we feel it is appropriate for a share of the proceeds going towards helping our serving forces.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact the record company directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
